body.p:
Washington Mason County Ky Aug 10th 1861
To his exelency Beria McGoffin. Governor of
of the Commonwealth of Kentucky
Dear Sir --

I hereby tender my resignation as Justice of the peace for Mason County in the tenth Justices District for Said County. and would recommend to your Exelency. the appointment of Robertson R. Maltby. to fill the vacancy until the next Election. Mr Maltby is well qualified to fill the office. and would probably be more acceptable to the people than any other man that could be induced at this time to accept the office

Very Respectfully Yours
Wm J Thurman J. P. M. C

Mason Co
J. P.
Dist No 10.
R.R. Maltby
vice
Wm J Thurman
Com Issd Aug 14 1861
